com.ibm.team.repository.client
Class TeamPlatform

java.lang.Object
  com.ibm.team.repository.client.TeamPlatform

public final class TeamPlatform
extends java.lang.Object

The central class of the IBM Team Platform. This class cannot be instantiated or subclassed by clients; all functionality is provided by static methods. Features include:

  • the repository service
  • platform initialization

Since:
0.5

Field Detail

PI_REPOSITORY

public static final java.lang.String PI_REPOSITORY
The unique identifier constant (value "com.ibm.team.repository") of the Team Platform's Repository component.

See Also:
Constant Field Values
Method Detail

startup

public static final void startup()
Starts the platform. Clients are required to call this method once before using the team platform if they are running in a non Eclipse runtime (a.k.a. OSGi) environment. For example, if writing a plain java client. Otherwise it's called automatically by the Eclipse runtime.

Since:
0.5

shutdown

public static final void shutdown()
Shuts down the platform. Clients are required to call this method once before their application exits if they are running in a non Eclipse runtime (a.k.a. OSGi) environment. For example if writing a plain java client. Otherwise it's called automatically.

Since:
0.5

isStarted

public static final boolean isStarted()
Returns the startup state of the platform.

Returns:
true if TeamPlatform.startup() has been called, and false otherwise.
Since:
0.5

setMaxContentThreads

public static void setMaxContentThreads(int count)
Specify the number of simultaneous downloads an IContentManagerSession should attempt at once. The parameter to this setter is used by IContentManager.createSession(String, long, IProgressMonitor), and ignored by IContentManager.createSession(int, String, long, IProgressMonitor).

Parameters:
count - The number of downloads that may occur at the same time. Must be a non-negative number. If zero is specified, the the number of simultaneous downloads is decided internally.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the count is less than zero.

getMaxContentThreads

public static int getMaxContentThreads()
Get the number of downloads a IContentManagerSession should attempt at once.

Returns:
0 If the number of simultaneous downloads is decided internally.

getTeamRepositoryService

public static final ITeamRepositoryService getTeamRepositoryService()
Return the interface into the team repository. The returned object can be used to contact specific team repositories and access other repository services.

Returns:
an object to interface into the team repository
Since:
0.5
